Actions: Each opponent sacrifices all enchantments they control.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]
Exile all tapped creatures opponents control.[Sorcery][CMC:5]
Until end of turn, players can't cast spells or activate abilities unless they pay (2) for each.[Enchantment][CMC:4]
Each opponent sacrifices two nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:4]
Create X 2/2 white Knight tokens with vigilance, where X is the number of creatures opponents control.[Creature][CMC:5]
Until the end of the Raid Monster’s next turn, players cannot attack or block with more than one creature.[Enchantment][CMC:4]
Tap all creatures. They don’t untap during their controller’s next untap phase.[Sorcery][CMC:4]
Each opponent exiles the top five cards of their library. You gain 1 life for each creature or enchantment exiled this way.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:4]
Destroy all non-token creatures. Each opponent creates a 1/1 white Soldier token for each creature they controlled this way.[Sorcery][CMC:5]
Until the Raid Monster’s next turn, damage dealt to it is prevented and redirected to the source’s controller.[Enchantment][CMC:4]
